synopsis.text: Stitch, a mischievous alien genetic experiment, finds himself kidnapped by space criminals seeking to replicate his destructive capabilities for their own sinister purposes. After breaking free in the ensuing chaos, he escapes to Earth and crashes down in the Huangshan mountains of rural China. There, he befriends a spirited young girl named Ai and her family, passing himself off as their pet dog. However, Stitch's extraterrestrial pursuers remain determined to capture him. With Ai and her sister Jiejie's help, Stitch fends off the persistent gangs even as he assists the family with their own troubles. Eventually his creator, the alien scientist Jumba, and his associate Pleakley track Stitch down, aiming to contain the potential threat he poses. But recognizing Stitch's newfound bonds, they reluctantly allow him to stay in the mountains under their supervision. Throughout it all, Stitch strives to control his innate destructive programming to protect his newfound loved ones, unaware of a hidden monstrous alter ego Jumba secretly implanted within him long ago. As the threat of his past returning to haunt him looms near, Stitch races against time to keep his true nature concealed in order to remain with the family he has come to cherish.
